programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Third Test Day Three.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Coverage of the third day of the Third Test in the four-match series, which is held at The Oval. The sides last met here in this format in 2012, when the tourists opened up their tour with a dominant victory by an innings and 12 runs, with Hashim Amla producing an outstanding knock of 311 not out for the Proteas, and Graeme Smith and Jacques Kallis also recording centuries

programme.title: A Sporting Chance
programme.desc: Documentary following an initiative to transform the lives of a group of young adults from Limerick through the power of sport, hoping that coaching them on the field will encourage them back into education. Over 12 weeks the group take on a sports journalism programme by day and in the evenings they are coached by former Munster rugby stars in preparation for a prestigious international tag rugby competition in London

programme.title: A Sporting Chance
programme.desc: Liam Toland and Rosie Foley face an uphill struggle as they try to encourage their charges to commit to their training programme. In an attempt to boost morale, Munster Rugby invites the participants to an evening game, before Liam and Rosie ask them to write about their experience, with the two best essays winning their writers VIP tickets to watch Brian O'Driscoll play in his last home game for Ireland before retirement. Finally, the trainers organise a challenge game for their group, but the training programme hits a major setback when fights break out after the team is badly beaten

programme.title: A Sporting Chance
programme.desc: Only a few weeks remain before the team must head to London, but spirits are low. Liam Toland and Rosie Foley decide a spot of team-building is in order, and take their charges to the race track for some high-speed go-karting. The group also organises an event for a suicide-prevention charity operating in Limerick, and hopes remain that, if their efforts prove successful, the players' confidence will be boosted ahead of the tag rugby tournament

ATP 500 Hamburg (28.7.2017)
programme.desc: Prvi teniški turnir v Hamburgu so organizirali že leta 1892 in je bil več let na sporedu maja, ko so se igralci pripravljali na Roland Garros, v zadnjem času pa je na sporedu sredi poletja. Pred letom dni je bil na igriščih centra Am Rothenbaum najboljši Martin Kilžan. Kdo bo letos dvignil pokal?

programme.title: Live! Serbian League: Partizan - Javor
programme.desc: Partizan je silovito krenil v novo prvenstvo, saj je Mačvo odpravil s kar 6:1 in bo tudi proti Javorju lovil vse tri točke. Lahko gostje v Beogradu pripravijo presenečenje in domačim vzamejo vsaj točko?

programme.title: Live! ATP 250 Atlanta: 1/2 finale (1x)
programme.desc: Medtem ko nekateri igralci po Wimbledonu ostajajo v Evropi, kjer se bodo merili tudi v Hamburgu na peščeni podlagi, se drugi že selijo v ZDA, kjer bo potekala glavnina sezone na trdi podlagi. Eden od prvih turnirjev bo na sporedu v Atlanti, kjer je bil pred letom dni najboljši "slabi deček" Nick Kyrgios, ki bo letos poskušal ubraniti lovoriko

programme.title: Avstrijska liga: Salzburg - Lask
programme.desc: Avstrijska Bundesliga je najvišje rangirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Avstriji. Ustanovljena je bila daljnega leta 1911. V njej nastopa 10 klubov, ki med seboj odločajo o naslovu državnega prvaka. Daleč najuspešnejši klub je Rapid, ki je osvojil kar 32 naslovov, sledi mu Austria, ki jih je v svoje vitrine pospravila 24. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Salzburga

programme.title: Švicarska liga: Basel - Luzern
programme.desc: Raiffeisen Super League je profesionalna nogometna liga v Švici. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1931. V njej nastopa 10 klubov. Igra se po štiri-krožnem sistemu (vsi udeleženci lige se med seboj udarijo štirikrat; dvakrat doma in dvakrat v gosteh). Tako po 36. odigranih krogih dobimo novega državnega prvaka. programme.title: NBA Home Video
programme.sub-title: Michael Jordan: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: Highlights of Michael Jordan's career, including comments from the all-time great. Entitled “Come Fly with Me.” (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 1998: Bulls at Jazz
programme.desc: From 1998: Chicago at Utah in Game 6 of the NBA Finals. An ailing Michael Jordan hit the game-winner with seconds to play as the Bulls won 87-86 to clinch their sixth title of the 1990s. Jordan finished with 45 points. (cc)

programme.title: Rodman Revealed
programme.desc: Basketball Hall of Famer Dennis Rodman in a wide-ranging interview about his life and career. Host: David Aldridge. (cc)

programme.title: Allen Iverson The Answer
programme.desc: Four-time NBA scoring champ and 2001 MVP Allen Iverson discusses his career and impending enshrinement in the Basketball Hall of Fame. Coaches John Thompson and Larry Brown also comment on the talented, fearless, authentic and often-misunderstood guard. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2001: 76ers at Lakers
programme.desc: From 2001: Philadelphia at Los Angeles Lakers in Game 1 of the NBA Finals. (cc)

programme.title: Kevin Garnett The All-Star Interview
programme.desc: Kevin Garnett discusses growing up in South Carolina; the Timberwolves making him the first high-schooler in 20 years to be drafted into the NBA; the pressures of maturing into a superstar; the Celtics' "Big Three"; and becoming an NBA champion. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2008: Lakers at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2008: Los Angeles Lakers at Boston in Game 6 of the NBA Finals. The Celtics won 131-92 and thoroughly dominated L.A. en route to the most lopsided win in title-clinching games in NBA history. Both Kevin Garnett and Ray Allen dropped 26 points in the win. Boston clinched the series 4-2 for its 17th banner. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Finals Defining Moments
programme.desc: Featured: LeBron James' 10-year run beginning with his first NBA Finals in 2007; Ray Allen's series-turning 3-pointer in Game 6 of the 2013 Finals for Miami vs. San Antonio; and the 20th anniversary of Utah's back-to-back Western Conference titles. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2013: Spurs at Heat
programme.desc: From 2013: San Antonio at Miami in Game 6 of the Finals. Tim Duncan (30 points) and LeBron James (triple-double) starred in a stirring contest that saw the defending-champion Heat overcome a five-point deficit with 28 seconds left, knotting the series. (cc)

programme.title: Shaq The Big Conversation
programme.desc: An in-depth interview with Shaquille O'Neal preceding his entrance into the Hall of Fame. Ernie Johnson hosts. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2000: Pacers at Lakers
programme.desc: From 2000: Indiana at Los Angeles Lakers in Game 6 of the NBA Finals. (cc)

programme.title: Vince Carter The Interview

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2001: 76ers at Raptors
programme.desc: From 2001: Philadelphia at Toronto in Game 3 of an Eastern Conference semifinal. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 1991: Spurs at Warriors
programme.desc: From 1991: San Antonio at Golden State in Game 3 of a Western Conference quarterfinal series. The Warriors' "Run TMC" trio combined for 71 points to run past David Robinson and the Spurs. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 1991: Warriors at Lakers
programme.desc: From 1991: Golden State at Los Angeles Lakers in Game 2 of the Western Conference finals. The Warriors upset L.A. 125-124 on Mario Elie's free throws with 3.1 seconds left. Magic Johnson set a playoff career-high with 44 points. (cc)

programme.desc: Bob and Chris Beck hunt elk in the high country of Wyoming at Star Valley Outfitters(n)

programme.title: Big Boys TV *
programme.desc: Part 1. It's Kevin and Jada's favorite time of year, the Michigan elk season is in full swing and Kevin goes on his once-in-a-lifetime elk hunt(n)

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: In the treacherous mountains of New Zealand and Jessi Jo's red stag already checked off the list, Jess Smith has her sights set on tahr(n)

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Melissa Bachman heads to Alaska with her dad in search of a big black bear with good friend Jason Boyer on Prince of Wales Island(n)

programme.title: Beyond The Divide *
programme.sub-title: Wild Dogs of the Victorian High Country
programme.desc: Wild dogs are a serious issue for farmers. The damage through stock losses and lost productivity is huge. Rob teams up with a wild dog behavioral expert to hunt northeastern Victoria trying to call in these dangerous predators(n)

programme.title: West of Texas
programme.desc: Hunting in the untouched wilderness of Canada's Northwest Territories, Stephen West and friend Gary Sitton are in a man-against-nature situation. The main focus of this hunt is a Dall sheep for Gary(n)
